sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who was attending Monday’s event at the White House, applauded the move and pointed to a serious uptick in ghost guns being found by police.
author: MICHAEL BALSAMO
title: Biden to nominate new ATF director, release ghost gun rule
